Body:
def fake_handler(thrown_exc, request):
    return ResponseBuilder().set_status(HTTPStatus.OK).build()
exception_handlers = ErrorHandlersBuilder().add_pre_response_error_handler(
    Exception, fake_handler).build()
response = exception_handlers.handle_pre_response_error(Exception(),
    'fake request')
self.assertEqual(HTTPStatus.OK.value, response.status.code)
